name: LWN beautifier
description: Make Linux Weekly News (LWN.net) look better
additional_info:
This is a WIP.

New version: comment support!

By default, the comment titles are all removed. (They are mostly a reflection of the article's title.) There is a comment that indicates that a single line can be commented out and you will have the first comment title in a thread. (All the children titles are still hidden.)
